markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Touch of Corruption](/Spells.aspx?ID=819)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Negative" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=118" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 229 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing undead creature or 1 living creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You infuse the target with negative energy. If the target is living, this deals 1d6 negative damage (basic Fortitude save); on a failed save, the target also takes a –2 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

 If the target is a willing [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature, the target instead regains 6 Hit Points, and if you are the undead target, you also gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 round.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the damage dealt to a living creature by 1d6 or increase the Hit Points regained by undead by 6.
name: Touch of Corruption

text: Touch of Corruption Single Action Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 229 2.0 Cast somatic Range touch Target 1 willing undead creature or 1 living creature --- You infuse the target with negative energy. If the target is living, this deals 1d6 negative damage (basic Fortitude save); on a failed save, the target also takes a –2 status penalty to AC for 1 round. If the target is a willing undead creature, the target instead regains 6 Hit Points, and if you are the undead target, you also gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 round. --- Heightened (+1) Increase the damage dealt to a living creature by 1d6 or increase the Hit Points regained by undead by 6.
